name: Yawhops
description:
Press F to toggle inversion for the Left Stick's Vertical Axis if needed.

Press Escape to unlock cursor.

Move: WASD / Left Joystick

Camera: Arrow Keys / Right Joystick / Mouse Position / Trigger Buttons

Jump: Space / Left Click / Bottom Face Button

Toggle Resolution: Press the 1 Key
